identifier: 2022--02--22--en--myrss--Steven Lee Myers, Paul Mozur and Jeff Kao--NewsArticle--https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nytimes.com%2F2022%2F02%2F18%2Ftechnology%2Fchina-olympics-propaganda.html
headline: How China Uses Bots and Fake Twitter Accounts to Shape the Olympics
description: The country’s propagandists have used a variety of tools online to promote a vision of the Games that is free of rancor or controversy.

author.name: Steven Lee Myers, Paul Mozur and Jeff Kao

headline_zh-Hans: 中国如何利用机器人和虚假的推特账户来塑造奥运会
headline_zh-Hant: 中國如何利用機器人和虛假的推特賬戶來塑造奧運會
description_zh-Hans: 该国的宣传人员在网上使用各种工具来宣传没有敌意或争议的奥运会愿景。
description_zh-Hant: 該國的宣傳人員在網上使用各種工具來宣傳沒有敵意或爭議的奧運會願景。
